description:
For logging serious kilometres on the trails, this ultra-running vest hugs your body to reduce bouncing and to smooth out chafe zones. Plenty of chest pockets and a large back pocket provide quick access to your water, fuel, layers and safety gear.

  • Stretchy and breathable fabrics wick moisture
  • Sensifit design balances the load to reduce bounce
  • Chest closure system lets you adjust two different buckles with one quick release-tab
  • Main compartment has side opening
  • 2 front stretch pockets plus 2 hydration pockets and 2 zippered pockets
  • Includes 2, 500ml Soft Flask Speed bottles
  • Integrated whistle adds piece of mind
name: Salomon Sense Pro 10 Set Running Vest - Unisex
